greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{k>=0} (1/A055209(k)).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
program: (MAGMA) SetDefaultRealField(RealField(100)); b:=[1] cat [(&*[(Factorial(k))^2: k in [1..n]]): n in [1..60]];  (&+[1.0/b[k]: k in [1..50]]); // _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 28 2018
(PARI) default(realprecision, 100); sum(n=0,50, 1.0/prod(i=0, n, i!)^2) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 28 2018
results.author: _Jani Melik_, Jun 06 2015
